name: @saekitominaga/htmltablecellelement-ditto
description: Display the data cell with the same content as the cell directly above in <tbody> with a ditto mark.

scripts._ts-watch:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.esm.js -- brotlin compress dist/TableCellDitto.esm.js -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.esm.js -- terser dist/TableCellDitto.esm.js -o dist/TableCellDitto.min.esm.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map base=dist,filename=TableCellDitto.esm.js,includeSources
scripts._ts-watch:compress-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.min.esm.js -- brotlin compress dist/TableCellDitto.min.esm.js -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:dts-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.esm.d.ts -- cpy dist/TableCellDitto.esm.d.ts dist --rename=TableCellDitto.min.esm.d.ts

author: Saeki Tominaga
